verses.roman:
'kṛṣṇere bāhira nāhi kariha vraja haite
vraja chāḍi' kṛṣṇa kabhu nā yāna kāhāṅte

synonyms: kṛṣṇere—Kṛṣṇa; bāhira—outside; nāhi—do not; kariha—take; vraja haite—from Vṛndāvana; vraja chāḍi'-leaving Vṛndāvana; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kabhu—at any time; nā—not; yāna—goes; kāhāṅte—anywhere.
translation: Do not try to take Kṛṣṇa out of Vṛndāvana, for He does not go anywhere else at any time.
